randoop.main

Class ClassReader

  • Object
    • ClassReader

  • public class ClassReader
extends Object
    ClassReader is a library of static methods that converts a list of class names into a list of Class objects. The list of names may be read from a file, an input stream (or reader), and the resulting list is constructed using reflection.

    (Extracted from class previously known as randoop.util.Reflection.)

    • Method Detail

      • getClassesForNames

        public static List<Class<?>> getClassesForNames(List<String> classNames,
                                                ClassNameErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Returns a list of Class objects given a list of class names. In the case that the type name recognition throws an exception, an error is only thrown if ignoreBadNames is false.
        Parameters:
        classNames - the list of fully-qualified class names.
        errorHandler - an object to determine behavior for erroneous class name.
        Returns:
        list of Class objects corresponding to elements of list.

      • getClassesForStream

        public static List<Class<?>> getClassesForStream(InputStream in,
                                                 String filename)
        Returns a list of Class objects given a stream containing class names. Blank lines and lines starting with "#" are ignored.
        Parameters:
        in - an InputStream from which class names are read.
        filename - the name of the file from which class names are read.
        Returns:
        list of Class objects corresponding to class names from stream.
        See Also:
        getClassesForReader(BufferedReader, String)

      • getClassesForReader

        public static List<Class<?>> getClassesForReader(BufferedReader reader,
                                                 String filename)
        Returns a list of Class objects given a BufferedReader object from which to read class names. Blank lines and lines starting with "#" are ignored.
        Parameters:
        reader - a BufferedReader from which to read class names.
        filename - the name of the input file.
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects corresponding to class names.

      • getClassesForFile

        public static List<Class<?>> getClassesForFile(File classListingFile)
                                        throws IOException
        Returns a list of Class objects given a file containing class names. Blank lines and lines starting with "#" are ignored.
        Parameters:
        classListingFile - a File object from which to read the class names
        Returns:
        list of Class objects corresponding to class names
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading classListingFile
